txt.en: 'Hullo! Would you like to be an \qAcquaintance\q of Limlight Gorge? Well look no further! Completion of this quest should do that just for you.\n\n'If this sounds good to you, speak to me again!'
'Alright, soon Limlight Gorge will consider you an Acquaintance. Ready?'
Talk to the friendly rep Man to continue
By completing this quest, you will be considered an Acquaintance of Limlight Gorge.
